H1.text: who sings i wan na rock'n'roll all night. AC/DC

H3.text: who sings i wan na rock'n'roll all night. Kiss

A4.text: The first version of 'Rock and Roll All Nite' with a guitar solo was recorded by Kiss on their Alive! album.

A5.text: Gene Simmons stated that 'Rock and Roll All Nite' is a direct bastard child of Slade's 'Mama Weer All Crazee Now'.
